4429  {
4430  var col = settings.aoColumns[ colIdx ];
4431 
4432  _fnBindAction( attachTo, {}, function (e) {
4433  /* If the column is not sortable - don't to anything */
4434  if ( col.bSortable === false ) {
4435  return;
4436  }
4437 
4438  _fnProcessingDisplay( settings, true );
4439 
4440  // Use a timeout to allow the processing display to be shown.
4441  setTimeout( function() {
4442  _fnSortListener( settings, colIdx, e.shiftKey, callback );
4443 
4444  // In server-side processing, the draw callback will remove the
4445  // processing display
4446  if ( _fnDataSource( settings ) !== 'ssp' ) {
4447  _fnProcessingDisplay( settings, false );
4448  }
4449  }, 0 );
4450  } );
4451  }

4572  function _fnLoadState ( oSettings, oInit )
4573  {
4574  var i, ien;
4575  var columns = oSettings.aoColumns;
4576 
4577  if ( !oSettings.oFeatures.bStateSave )
4578  {
4579  return;
4580  }
4581 
4582  var oData = oSettings.fnStateLoadCallback.call( oSettings.oInstance, oSettings );
4583  if ( !oData )
4584  {
4585  return;
4586  }
4587 
4588  /* Allow custom and plug-in manipulation functions to alter the saved data set and
4589  * cancelling of loading by returning false
4590  */
4591  var abStateLoad = _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoStateLoadParams', 'stateLoadParams', [oSettings, oData] );
4592  if ( $.inArray( false, abStateLoad ) !== -1 )
4593  {
4594  return;
4595  }
4596

4598  if ( oData.iCreate < new Date().getTime() - (oSettings.iStateDuration*1000) ) {
4599  return;
4600  }
4601 
4602  // Number of columns have changed - all bets are off, no restore of settings
4603  if ( columns.length !== oData.aoSearchCols.length ) {
4604  return;
4605  }
4606 
4607  /* Store the saved state so it might be accessed at any time */
4608  oSettings.oLoadedState = $.extend( true, {}, oData );
4609 
4610  /* Restore key features */
4611  oSettings._iDisplayStart = oData.iStart;
4612  oSettings.iInitDisplayStart = oData.iStart;
4613  oSettings._iDisplayLength = oData.iLength;
4614  oSettings.aaSorting = [];
4615 
4616  var savedSort = oData.aaSorting;
4617  for ( i=0, ien=savedSort.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
4618  oSettings.aaSorting.push( savedSort[i][0] >= columns.length ?
4619  [ 0, savedSort[i][1] ] :
4620  savedSort[i]
4621  );
4622  }
4623

4626  $.extend( true, oSettings.aoPreSearchCols, oData.aoSearchCols );
4627 
4628  /* Column visibility state */
4629  for ( i=0, ien=oData.abVisCols.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
4630  columns[i].bVisible = oData.abVisCols[i];
4631  }
4632 
4633  _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoStateLoaded', 'stateLoaded', [oSettings, oData] );
4634  }

4699  function _fnMap( ret, src, name, mappedName )
4700  {
4701  if ( $.isArray( name ) ) {
4702  $.each( name, function (i, val) {
4703  if ( $.isArray( val ) ) {
4704  _fnMap( ret, src, val[0], val[1] );
4705  }
4706  else {
4707  _fnMap( ret, src, val );
4708  }
4709  } );
4710 
4711  return;
4712  }
4713 
4714  if ( mappedName === undefined ) {
4715  mappedName = name;
4716  }
4717 
4718  if ( src[name] !== undefined ) {
4719  ret[mappedName] = src[name];
4720  }
4721  }

4741  function _fnExtend( out, extender, breakRefs )
4742  {
4743  var val;
4744 
4745  for ( var prop in extender ) {
4746  if ( extender.hasOwnProperty(prop) ) {
4747  val = extender[prop];
4748 
4749  if ( $.isPlainObject( val ) ) {
4750  if ( ! $.isPlainObject( out[prop] ) ) {
4751  out[prop] = {};
4752  }
4753  $.extend( true, out[prop], val );
4754  }
4755  else if ( breakRefs && prop !== 'data' && prop !== 'aaData' && $.isArray(val) ) {
4756  out[prop] = val.slice();
4757  }
4758  else {
4759  out[prop] = val;
4760  }
4761  }
4762  }
4763 
4764  return out;
4765  }

4870  function _fnRenderer( settings, type )
4871  {

4873  var host = DataTable.ext.renderer[type];
4874 
4875  if ( $.isPlainObject( renderer ) && renderer[type] ) {
4876  // Specific renderer for this type. If available use it, otherwise use
4877  // the default.
4878  return host[renderer[type]] || host._;
4879  }
4880  else if ( typeof renderer === 'string' ) {
4881  // Common renderer - if there is one available for this type use it,
4882  // otherwise use the default
4883  return host[renderer] || host._;
4884  }
4885 
4886  // Use the default
4887  return host._;
4888  }

7248 
7249  var _selector_run = function ( selector, select )
7250  {
7251  var
7252  out = [], res,
7253  a, i, ien, j, jen;
7254 
7255  if ( ! $.isArray( selector ) ) {
7256  selector = [ selector ];
7257  }
7258 
7259  for ( i=0, ien=selector.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
7260  a = selector[i] && selector[i].split ?
7261  selector[i].split(',') :
7262  [ selector[i] ];
7263 
7264  for ( j=0, jen=a.length ; j<jen ; j++ ) {
7265  res = select( typeof a[j] === 'string' ? $.trim(a[j]) : a[j] );
7266 
7267  if ( res && res.length ) {
7268  out.push.apply( out, res );
7269  }
7270  }
7271  }
7272 
7273  return out;
7274  };
7275 
7276 
7277  var _selector_opts = function ( opts )
7278  {
7279  if ( ! opts ) {
7280  opts = {};
7281  }
7282 
7283  // Backwards compatibility for 1.9- which used the terminology filter rather
7284  // than search
7285  if ( opts.filter && ! opts.search ) {
7286  opts.search = opts.filter;
7287  }
7288 
7289  return {
7290  search: opts.search || 'none',
7291  order: opts.order || 'current',
7292  page: opts.page || 'all'
7293  };
7294  };
7295 
7296 
7297  var _selector_first = function ( inst )
7298  {
7299  // Reduce the API instance to the first item found
7300  for ( var i=0, ien=inst.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
7301  if ( inst[i].length > 0 ) {
7302  // Assign the first element to the first item in the instance
7303  // and truncate the instance and context
7304  inst[0] = inst[i];
7305  inst.length = 1;
7306  inst.context = [ inst.context[i] ];
7307 
7308  return inst;
7309  }
7310  }
7311 
7312  // Not found - return an empty instance
7313  inst.length = 0;
7314  return inst;
7315  };
7316 
7317 
7318  var _selector_row_indexes = function ( settings, opts )
7319  {
7320  var
7321  i, ien, tmp, a=[],
7322  displayFiltered = settings.aiDisplay,
7323  displayMaster = settings.aiDisplayMaster;
7324 
7325  var
7326  search = opts.search, // none, applied, removed
7327  order = opts.order, // applied, current, index (original - compatibility with 1.9)
7328  page = opts.page; // all, current
7329 
7330  // Current page implies that order=current and fitler=applied, since it is
7331  // fairly senseless otherwise, regardless of what order and search actually
7332  // are
7333  if ( page == 'current' )
7334  {
7335  for ( i=settings._iDisplayStart, ien=settings.fnDisplayEnd() ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
7336  a.push( displayFiltered[i] );
7337  }
7338  }
7339  else if ( order == 'current' || order == 'applied' ) {
7340  a = search == 'none' ?
7341  displayMaster.slice() : // no search
7342  search == 'applied' ?
7343  displayFiltered.slice() : // applied search
7344  $.map( displayMaster, function (el, i) { // removed search
7345  return $.inArray( el, displayFiltered ) === -1 ? el : null;
7346  } );
7347  }
7348  else if ( order == 'index' || order == 'original' ) {
7349  for ( i=0, ien=settings.aoData.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
7350  if ( search == 'none' ) {
7351  a.push( i );
7352  }
7353  else { // applied | removed
7354  tmp = $.inArray( i, displayFiltered );
7355 
7356  if ((tmp === -1 && search == 'removed') ||
7357  (tmp === 1 && search == 'applied') )
7358  {
7359  a.push( i );
7360  }
7361  }
7362  }
7363  }
7364 
7365  return a;
7366  };
7367 
7368 
7369  /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
7370  * Rows
7371  *
7372  * {} - no selector - use all available rows
7373  * {integer} - row aoData index
7374  * {node} - TR node
7375  * {string} - jQuery selector to apply to the TR elements
7376  * {array} - jQuery array of nodes, or simply an array of TR nodes
7377  *
7378  */
7379 
7380 
7381  var __row_selector = function ( settings, selector, opts )
7382  {
7383  return _selector_run( selector, function ( sel ) {
7384  var selInt = _intVal( sel );
7385 
7386  // Short cut - selector is a number and no options provided (default is
7387  // all records, so no need to check if the index is in there, since it
7388  // must be - dev error if the index doesn't exist).
7389  if ( selInt !== null && ! opts ) {
7390  return [ selInt ];
7391  }
7392 
7393  var rows = _selector_row_indexes( settings, opts );
7394 
7395  if ( selInt !== null && $.inArray( selInt, rows ) !== -1 ) {
7396  // Selector - integer
7397  return [ selInt ];
7398  }
7399  else if ( ! sel ) {
7400  // Selector - none
7401  return rows;
7402  }
7403 
7404  // Get nodes in the order from the `rows` array (can't use `pluck`) @todo - use pluck_order
7405  var nodes = [];
7406  for ( var i=0, ien=rows.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
7407  nodes.push( settings.aoData[ rows[i] ].nTr );
7408  }
7409 
7410  if ( sel.nodeName ) {
7411  // Selector - node
7412  if ( $.inArray( sel, nodes ) !== -1 ) {
7413  return [ sel._DT_RowIndex ];// sel is a TR node that is in the table
7414  // and DataTables adds a prop for fast lookup
7415  }
7416  }
7417 
7418  // Selector - jQuery selector string, array of nodes or jQuery object/
7419  // As jQuery's .filter() allows jQuery objects to be passed in filter,
7420  // it also allows arrays, so this will cope with all three options
7421  return $(nodes)
7422  .filter( sel )
7423  .map( function () {
7424  return this._DT_RowIndex;
7425  } )
7426  .toArray();
7427  } );
7428  };

7601  var __details_add = function ( ctx, row, data, klass )
7602  {
7603  // Convert to array of TR elements
7604  var rows = [];
7605  var addRow = function ( r, k ) {
7606  if ( ! r.nodeName || r.nodeName.toUpperCase() !== 'tr' ) {
7607  r = $('<tr><td></td></tr>').find('td').html( r ).parent();
7608  }
7609 
7610  $('td', r).addClass( k )[0].colSpan = _fnVisbleColumns( ctx );
7611  rows.push( r[0] );
7612  };
7613 
7614  if ( $.isArray( data ) || data instanceof $ ) {
7615  for ( var i=0, ien=data.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
7616  addRow( data[i], klass );
7617  }
7618  }
7619  else {
7620  addRow( data, klass );
7621  }
7622 
7623  if ( row._details ) {
7624  row._details.remove();
7625  }
7626 
7627  row._details = $(rows);
7628 
7629  // If the children were already shown, that state should be retained
7630  if ( row._detailsShow ) {
7631  row._details.insertAfter( row.nTr );
7632  }
7633  };

7640  var row = ctx[0].aoData[ this[0] ];
7641 
7642  if ( row._details ) {

7644  if ( show ) {
7645  row._details.insertAfter( row.nTr );
7646  }
7647  else {
7648  row._details.remove();
7649  }
7650 
7651  __details_events( ctx[0] );
7652  }

7742 
7743 
7744  /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
7745  * Columns
7746  *
7747  * {integer} - column index (>=0 count from left, <0 count from right)
7748  * "{integer}:visIdx" - visible column index (i.e. translate to column index) (>=0 count from left, <0 count from right)
7749  * "{integer}:visible" - alias for {integer}:visIdx (>=0 count from left, <0 count from right)
7750  * "{string}:name" - column name
7751  * "{string}" - jQuery selector on column header nodes
7752  *
7753  */
7754 
7755  // can be an array of these items, comma separated list, or an array of comma
7756  // separated lists
7757 
7758  var __re_column_selector = /^(.*):(name|visIdx|visible)$/;
7759 
7760  var __column_selector = function ( settings, selector, opts )
7761  {
7762  var
7763  columns = settings.aoColumns,
7764  names = _pluck( columns, 'sName' ),
7765  nodes = _pluck( columns, 'nTh' );
7766 
7767  return _selector_run( selector, function ( s ) {
7768  var selInt = _intVal( s );
7769 
7770  if ( s === '' ) {
7771  // All columns
7772  return _range( settings.aoColumns.length );
7773  }
7774  else if ( selInt !== null ) {
7775  // Integer selector
7776  return [ selInt >= 0 ?
7777  selInt : // Count from left
7778  columns.length + selInt // Count from right (+ because its a negative value)
7779  ];
7780  }
7781  else {
7782  var match = s.match( __re_column_selector );
7783 
7784  if ( match ) {
7785  switch( match[2] ) {
7786  case 'visIdx':
7787  case 'visible':
7788  var idx = parseInt( match[1], 10 );
7789  // Visible index given, convert to column index
7790  if ( idx < 0 ) {
7791  // Counting from the right
7792  var visColumns = $.map( columns, function (col,i) {
7793  return col.bVisible ? i : null;
7794  } );
7795  return [ visColumns[ visColumns.length + idx ] ];
7796  }
7797  // Counting from the left
7798  return [ _fnVisibleToColumnIndex( settings, idx ) ];
7799 
7800  case 'name':
7801  // match by name. `names` is column index complete and in order
7802  return $.map( names, function (name, i) {
7803  return name === match[1] ? i : null;
7804  } );
7805  }
7806  }
7807  else {
7808  // jQuery selector on the TH elements for the columns
7809  return $( nodes )
7810  .filter( s )
7811  .map( function () {
7812  return $.inArray( this, nodes ); // `nodes` is column index complete and in order
7813  } )
7814  .toArray();
7815  }
7816  }
7817  } );
7818  };
7819

7823 
7824  var __setColumnVis = function ( settings, column, vis ) {
7825  var
7826  cols = settings.aoColumns,
7827  col = cols[ column ],
7828  data = settings.aoData,
7829  row, cells, i, ien, tr;
7830 
7831  // Get
7832  if ( vis === undefined ) {
7833  return col.bVisible;
7834  }
7835 
7836  // Set
7837  // No change
7838  if ( col.bVisible === vis ) {
7839  return;
7840  }
7841 
7842  if ( vis ) {
7843  // Insert column
7844  // Need to decide if we should use appendChild or insertBefore
7845  var insertBefore = $.inArray( true, _pluck(cols, 'bVisible'), column+1 );
7846 
7847  for ( i=0, ien=data.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
7848  tr = data[i].nTr;
7849  cells = data[i].anCells;
7850 
7851  if ( tr ) {
7852  // insertBefore can act like appendChild if 2nd arg is null
7853  tr.insertBefore( cells[ column ], cells[ insertBefore ] || null );
7854  }
7855  }
7856  }
7857  else {
7858  // Remove column
7859  $( _pluck( settings.aoData, 'anCells', column ) ).remove();
7860 
7861  col.bVisible = false;
7862  _fnDrawHead( settings, settings.aoHeader );
7863  _fnDrawHead( settings, settings.aoFooter );
7864 
7865  _fnSaveState( settings );
7866  }
7867 
7868  // Common actions
7869  col.bVisible = vis;
7870  _fnDrawHead( settings, settings.aoHeader );
7871  _fnDrawHead( settings, settings.aoFooter );
7872 
7873  // Automatically adjust column sizing
7874  _fnAdjustColumnSizing( settings );
7875 
7876  // Realign columns for scrolling
7877  if ( settings.oScroll.sX || settings.oScroll.sY ) {
7878  _fnScrollDraw( settings );
7879  }
7880 
7881  _fnCallbackFire( settings, null, 'column-visibility', [settings, column, vis] );
7882 
7883  _fnSaveState( settings );
7884  };

8356  DataTable.versionCheck = DataTable.fnVersionCheck = function( version )
8357  {
8358  var aThis = DataTable.version.split('.');
8359  var aThat = version.split('.');
8360  var iThis, iThat;
8361 
8362  for ( var i=0, iLen=aThat.length ; i<iLen ; i++ ) {
8363  iThis = parseInt( aThis[i], 10 ) || 0;
8364  iThat = parseInt( aThat[i], 10 ) || 0;
8365 
8366  // Parts are the same, keep comparing
8367  if (iThis === iThat) {
8368  continue;
8369  }
8370 
8371  // Parts are different, return immediately
8372  return iThis > iThat;
8373  }
8374 
8375  return true;
8376  };

8488  remove = remove || false;
8489 
8490  return this.iterator( 'table', function ( settings ) {
8491  var orig = settings.nTableWrapper.parentNode;
8492  var classes = settings.oClasses;
8493  var table = settings.nTable;

8498  var jqTbody = $(tbody);

8504  // should be taken

8506

8508  _fnCallbackFire( settings, "aoDestroyCallback", "destroy", [settings] );
8509 
8510  // If not being removed from the document, make all columns visible
8511  if ( ! remove ) {
8512  new _Api( settings ).columns().visible( true );
8513  }

8516  jqWrapper.unbind('.DT').find(':not(tbody *)').unbind('.DT');
8517  $(window).unbind('.DT-'+settings.sInstance);
8518

8520  if ( table != thead.parentNode ) {
8521  jqTable.children('thead').remove();
8522  jqTable.append( thead );
8523  }
8524 
8525  if ( tfoot && table != tfoot.parentNode ) {
8526  jqTable.children('tfoot').remove();
8527  jqTable.append( tfoot );
8528  }
8529 
8530  // Remove the DataTables generated nodes, events and classes
8531  jqTable.remove();
8532  jqWrapper.remove();
8533 
8534  settings.aaSorting = [];
8535  settings.aaSortingFixed = [];
8536  _fnSortingClasses( settings );
8537

8541  classes.sSortableAsc+' '+classes.sSortableDesc+' '+classes.sSortableNone
8542  );

8559  jqTbody.children().detach();

8563  // so we can restore directly to that

8580  var idx = $.inArray( settings, DataTable.settings );
8581  if ( idx !== -1 ) {
8582  DataTable.settings.splice( idx, 1 );
8583  }
8584  } );
8585  } );

8990  /*
8991  * Developer note: The properties of the object below are given in Hungarian
8992  * notation, that was used as the interface for DataTables prior to v1.10, however
8993  * from v1.10 onwards the primary interface is camel case. In order to avoid
8994  * breaking backwards compatibility utterly with this change, the Hungarian
8995  * version is still, internally the primary interface, but is is not documented
8996  * - hence the @name tags in each doc comment. This allows a Javascript function
8997  * to create a map from Hungarian notation to camel case (going the other direction
8998  * would require each property to be listed, which would at around 3K to the size
8999  * of DataTables, while this method is about a 0.5K hit.
9000  *
9001  * Ultimately this does pave the way for Hungarian notation to be dropped
9002  * completely, but that is a massive amount of work and will break current
9003  * installs (therefore is on-hold until v2).
9004  */
9005

13465  var extPagination = DataTable.ext.pager;
13466 
13467  function _numbers ( page, pages ) {
13468  var
13469  numbers = [],
13470  buttons = extPagination.numbers_length,
13471  half = Math.floor( buttons / 2 ),
13472  i = 1;
13473 
13474  if ( pages <= buttons ) {
13475  numbers = _range( 0, pages );
13476  }
13477  else if ( page <= half ) {
13478  numbers = _range( 0, buttons-2 );
13479  numbers.push( 'ellipsis' );
13480  numbers.push( pages-1 );
13481  }
13482  else if ( page >= pages - 1 - half ) {
13483  numbers = _range( pages-(buttons-2), pages );
13484  numbers.splice( 0, 0, 'ellipsis' ); // no unshift in ie6
13485  numbers.splice( 0, 0, 0 );
13486  }
13487  else {
13488  numbers = _range( page-1, page+2 );
13489  numbers.push( 'ellipsis' );
13490  numbers.push( pages-1 );
13491  numbers.splice( 0, 0, 'ellipsis' );
13492  numbers.splice( 0, 0, 0 );
13493  }
13494 
13495  numbers.DT_el = 'span';
13496  return numbers;
13497  }
13498

13501  simple: function ( page, pages ) {
13502  return [ 'previous', 'next' ];
13503  },
13504 
13505  full: function ( page, pages ) {
13506  return [ 'first', 'previous', 'next', 'last' ];
13507  },
13508 
13509  simple_numbers: function ( page, pages ) {
13510  return [ 'previous', _numbers(page, pages), 'next' ];
13511  },
13512 
13513  full_numbers: function ( page, pages ) {
13514  return [ 'first', 'previous', _numbers(page, pages), 'next', 'last' ];
13515  },
13516 
13517  // For testing and plug-ins to use
13518  _numbers: _numbers,
13519  numbers_length: 7
13520  } );

13522 
13523  $.extend( true, DataTable.ext.renderer, {
13524  pageButton: {
13525  _: function ( settings, host, idx, buttons, page, pages ) {
13526  var classes = settings.oClasses;
13527  var lang = settings.oLanguage.oPaginate;
13528  var btnDisplay, btnClass;
13529 
13530  var attach = function( container, buttons ) {
13531  var i, ien, node, button;
13532  var clickHandler = function ( e ) {
13533  _fnPageChange( settings, e.data.action, true );
13534  };
13535 
13536  for ( i=0, ien=buttons.length ; i<ien ; i++ ) {
13537  button = buttons[i];
13538 
13539  if ( $.isArray( button ) ) {
13540  var inner = $( '<'+(button.DT_el || 'div')+'/>' )
13541  .appendTo( container );
13542  attach( inner, button );
13543  }
13544  else {
13545  btnDisplay = '';
13546  btnClass = '';
13547

13611  var __numericReplace = function ( d, re1, re2 ) {

13624  }

13626  return d * 1;
